uni.joel.deckard.logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • uni.joel.deckard.logic.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Player has a name, their deck, their hand (if they are in battle), hitpoints, armor, mana and manaproduction which are all int values.
    Author:
    Joel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(String name)
        Constructor for Player. Creates a new deck for the player called "game deck" and gives the player a new hand.
        Parameters:
        name - The name that the player gets.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the card was used successfully, otherwise false.

        public int getHitpoints()

      • changeHitpointsTo

        public void changeHitpointsTo(int hitpoints)
        Changes hitpoints to given amount. Does nothing if amount is not between 0 and Player.maxHitpoints.
        Parameters:
        hitpoints - The new value to be given to the player's hitpoints.

      • changeHitpointsBy

        public void changeHitpointsBy(int amount)
        Changes hitpoints by the given amount. Amount can be positive or negative. Hitpoints will be lowered if amount is negative and vice versa. If hitpoints are tried to lower or raise too much, instead changes them to 0 or Player.maxHitpoints, respectively.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount that the player's hitpoints should be changed by.
